div.p: Garrett-Keyser-Butler Community School District would like to welcome you to our website! Subscribe to our Facebook or Twitter to receive updates on school and district information!

div.div: Garrett Keyser Butler Community Schools physical school building will be closed the remainder of this school year. We will continue our classrooms through virtual learning. Attached is a schedule for virtual learning for the remainder of the year.

div.a: Garrett Keyser Butler CSD Virtual Board Meeting
div.div: The board meeting schedueled for April 27th will still be taking place from 5:45PM-7:00PM. This meeting will be virtual through Zoom, and anyone can join! Select the link below to access the school board meeting. We hope that you can join us!
div.a: Read More about Garrett Keyser Butler CSD Virtual Board Meeting

div.div: We are so excited to welcome your son/daughter to JE Ober Elementary School! Unfortunately, due to COVID-19, we are unable to hold our annual Kindergarten Round-Up at this time. This Pre-Registration form will allow us to keep you updated of events happening prior to school starting in August!
div.a: Read More about Pre-Registering Students for Kindergarten
